title: Implement GameProvider, GameLayout, TerminalPanel, OverlayLayer
description:
Goal:
- Implement GameProvider with reducer, state slices, and actions.
- Implement GameLayout shell and TerminalPanel / OverlayLayer per specs.
- Wire overlay hints and terminal history updates.

Notes:
- Keep reducer pure and validate action payloads.
- OverlayLayer must render hints with optional docs links.

Doc refs:

- src/components/game/game-layout.md
- src/components/game/terminal-panel.md
- src/components/game/overlay-layer.md

title: Add GSAP dependency and drag/snap utility
description:
Goal:
- Add gsap dependency and internal helper that wraps Draggable + InertiaPlugin.
- Keep GSAP imports inside game components (question pages never import gsap directly).
- Provide grid snap configuration based on canvas block sizing.

Notes:
- Verify gsap/Draggable and gsap/InertiaPlugin import paths.
- Centralize initialization and cleanup to avoid memory leaks.

title: Implement PlayCanvas + InventoryPanel GSAP drag/snap
description:
Goal:
- Build PlayCanvas and InventoryPanel components using the GSAP drag/snap utility.
- Implement grid snapping, drop validation, and connection creation per spec.
- Keep drag state local; dispatch PLACE_ITEM and MAKE_CONNECTION only on valid drop.

Notes:
- Ensure drag preview and snap behavior match Canvas Block System rules.
- InventoryPanel should only set drag data; no game logic.
